Title: Mobsters
Writer: Michael Mahern (story), Michael Mahern (screenplay), Nicholas Kazan (screenplay)
Actors: Christian Slater, Rodney Eastman, Costas Mandylor, Richard Grieco
Plot: From start to finish, it's a story of friendship between 4 street-wise males who don't mind using violence to achieve the lives that they want. They trust no one but each other which is vital to their success as mobsters.
